entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy after midnight. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 07 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming south 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 34 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 07 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Wind south 20 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 23 in the evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 07 March 2023
